entry.title: Terra Crashed Spectacularly. Here's How It Launched.
entry.summary: It took four years for Terraform labs to grow as big as it did, with key moments along the way.

entry.title: 'Pharma Bro' Martin Shkreli: 'I Started Using Uniswap in Prison'
entry.summary: The convicted felon also shared his thoughts on DeFi and various coins.

entry.title: CZ Recommends Diversifying Investments Even Though He's 'All in' Crypto and Bitcoin
entry.summary: Changpeng Zhao isn't your typical investor.

entry.title: Why Maker's DAI Is Surviving Even After Collapse of Terra's Decentralized Stablecoin
entry.summary: Last week's stablecoin failures were the talk of the town, with UST biting the dust and USDT also briefly losing its dollar peg. Not DAI.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Market Freefall Slows, Universal Music Partners With LimeWire, G7 Seeks Regulation
entry.summary: While last week’s market crash resulted in severe liquidations, a two-month decline appears to be ending.

entry.title: Think Sports Will Back Away From Crypto and NFTs Because of the Crash? Think Again.
entry.summary: At a gathering this week of the most powerful people in the sports business, attendees were more crypto-curious than ever.

entry.title: Spike Lee on Using NFTs to Fund Films: 'The Horse Is Out the Barn'
entry.summary: The storied filmmaker speaks with Decrypt about his new Mars Blackmon NFTs and how Web3 can disrupt traditional film financing.

entry.title: House Bill Aims to Protect Bitcoin Retirement Accounts From Federal Ban
entry.summary: The new bill would block any attempts by the Department of Labor to restrict access to Bitcoin in 401(k) plans.

entry.title: Crypto Crash Unlikely to Hurt US Economy: Goldman Sachs
entry.summary: The recent decline is very small relative to U.S. household net worth, and therefore unlikely to have a major impact, the bank said.

entry.title: 'Crypto Boy' TikTok Star Is Releasing Her Own NFTs—But Has No Plans to Become 'CEO of Being Unemployed'
entry.summary: Off the success of her viral satire of crypto-obsessed men, Salem Ilese is launching an NFT collection with Pussy Riot co-founder Nadya Tolokonnikova next week.

entry.title: Gary Vee Kicks Off VeeCon 'Summer Camp' to Show NFTs Are 'More Than Just Collectibles'
entry.summary: Vaynerchuk speaks with Decrypt as his NFT-gated conference brings major creators and entertainers to Minneapolis.

entry.title: Upcoming Crypto Regulations 'Need to Take Into Account' Terra Collapse: UK Financial Authority
entry.summary: New rules for cryptocurrencies will be developed with the UST stablecoin collapse taken into consideration, according to the FCA.

entry.title: WNBA Fans Criticize Coinbase Sponsorship Amid Market Crash
entry.summary: Amid the market crash of the past two weeks, crypto sponsorship deals are seeing renewed backlash.

entry.title: Binance Adds Support for Layer-2 Ethereum Scaling Solution Optimism
entry.summary: Popular Ethereum scaling solution Optimism is now supported on the industry’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, Binance.

entry.title: Congress May 'Work More Quickly' on Stablecoin Regulations Amid UST Collapse: SEC Commissioner
entry.summary: “Crypto mom” has once again stated that she wants to see clear regulatory rules about using cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.

entry.title: Cosmos Jumps 12% as Bitcoin, Ethereum Recover
entry.summary: Amid a recovering crypto market, the token underpinning the Cosmos blockchain rose more than 12% over the past 24 hours.

entry.title: UnicornDAO Raises $4.5 Million to Support Women and LGBTQ+ Artists
entry.summary: The DAO says its mission is to support marginalized artists and underrepresented groups in Web3.

entry.title: Ethereum Merge Coming in August 'If Everything Goes to Plan': Core Dev
entry.summary: If developers can complete the merge to proof of stake in August, they won't have to worry about defusing the "difficulty bomb" that is about to go off.

entry.title: Azra Games Raises $15 Million for Play-and-Earn RPG With NFTs
entry.summary: But the company hasn't yet decided which blockchain it will be building on.

entry.title: Could Terra's Do Kwon Go to Prison?
entry.summary: Terra's collapse has triggered outrage and calls for repercussions. Should those involve criminal prosecution?

entry.title: Panama’s President Mulls Crypto Law Veto, Cites Money Laundering Concerns
entry.summary: Panama's "Crypto Law" would regulate the use of crypto for payments and legally recognize DAOs in the country.

entry.title: G7 Urges Crypto Regulations in Light of Terra Collapse: Report
entry.summary: The collapse of TerraUSD has put stablecoins in the sights of global regulators.

entry.title: New Tether Report Shows 17% Reduction in Commercial Paper
entry.summary: The latest assurance report from stablecoin provider Tether indicates the firm has made a few changes to the reserve assets backing USDT.

entry.title: Australia’s Largest Bank Halts Crypto Trading Pilot, Says More Regulation Needed
entry.summary: As uncertainty reigns over the market, the Commonwealth Bank of Australia has paused the launch of its planned crypto trading service.

entry.title: FTX US Launches Stock Trading, Accounts Can Be Funded With Stablecoins
entry.summary: FTX US has become the first crypto-native platform to also offer equities to its US customers.

entry.title: Avalanche Plummets Double-Digits as Crypto Meltdown Continues
entry.summary: The popular Ethereum competitor Avalanche has plummeted more than 16% amid the crypto market’s ongoing rout.

entry.title: CFTC Expected to Add More Resources to Better Monitor Crypto Markets
entry.summary: The derivatives markets regulator will continue to add resources to combat fraud and manipulation in the cryptocurrency market.

entry.title: Ethereum Nears Major Upgrade as Testnet Set to Undergo Merge in June
entry.summary: In the run-up to upgrading the mainnet, the Ethereum Foundation has also doubled reward payouts for its bug bounty program.

entry.title: The Big 'Winner' From the Crypto Crash? USDC Stablecoin
entry.summary: Every market—including a bearish one—has its winners and losers.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gensler Threatens Action Against Unregistered Crypto Exchanges
entry.summary: Testifying before Congress on Wednesday, he warned that more actions against crypto firms could be on the way.

entry.title: Terra Community Divided on Do Kwon’s ‘Authoritarian’ Hard Fork Proposal
entry.summary: While many are vocally against a hard fork, Terra’s validators appear to be in favor.

entry.title: Terra Investor Mike Novogratz Breaks Silence on UST, LUNA Collapse
entry.summary: Mike Novogratz was so invested in Terra, he got a LUNA tattoo earlier this year.

entry.title: Andreessen Horowitz Launches $600M Fund Focused on Metaverse Games
entry.summary: The gaming industry generated more than $300 billion last year.

entry.title: Coinbase Launches Global 'Think Tank' for Crypto
entry.summary: A new think tank is Coinbase's latest attempt to shape the debate around crypto policy.

entry.title: What Are Ethereum Rollups? A Scaling Solution to Cut Transaction Costs
entry.summary: Rollups cut down on blockchain transaction costs by "rolling up" batches of transactions into a single one. Here’s how they work.

entry.title: Aave Launches Decentralized, NFT-Based Twitter Rival on Polygon
entry.summary: Lens Protocol is designed to power social media platforms that can rival centralized giants like Twitter—and it’s powered by NFTs.

entry.title: Peckshield Sounds Alarm on Honeypot Posing as Terra Fork
entry.summary: The potential scam was discovered on Binance Smart Chain.

entry.title: ‘V1’ CryptoPunks Move on With Rarible Marketplace After Larva Labs Dispute
entry.summary: Free of DMCA takedown claims, the community NFT project is writing its own story now—and hopes to unite all CryptoPunks owners.

entry.title: South Korean Law Firm to File Suit Against Terraform Labs CEO, Co-Founder
entry.summary: The law firm will also file to have Do Kwon’s property seized in the aftermath of last week’s Terra collapse.

entry.title: Polygon-Based Gaming Platform FreshCut Raises $15M
entry.summary: FreshCut CEO James Kuk joins the wave of former Twitch execs starting their own Web3 gaming companies.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is Web3?
entry.summary: Web3 is the next evolution of the Internet, built on blockchains. Blockchains are a new kind of database, making new types of peer-to-peer apps possible. This has profound implications for humanity.

entry.title: How Brands Are Creating Immersive Experiences in the Metaverse
entry.summary: In Episode 10 of the Navigating the Metaverse podcast, hosted by Cathy Hackl and Tommaso di Bartolo, Andrew Hayward of Decrypt and Josh Roth of Decrypt Studios discuss how companies are approaching the metaverse, where it could all go next, and what it was like to watch a movie in a Lamborghini on the moon.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto crash roundtable
entry.summary: Crypto bloodbath! How low will the major coins go, and what about Terra and stablecoins? Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Jeff Benson, Stacy Elliott and Jason Nelson will discuss the news and parse through what’s happened and what might happen next.

entry.title: Infura Co-Founder E.G. Galano Talks Otherside NFT Mint, Ethereum Gas Fees
entry.summary: Infura co-founder and general manager E.G. Galano talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about what Infura does, how the Bored Ape Yacht Club could have avoided the hiccups with its Otherdeed NFT mint, other hot NFT collections like Moonbirds, and Ethereum's gas fee issues.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is Ethereum 2.0? Ethereum's Consensus Layer and Merge Explained
entry.summary: The long-planned upgrade to Ethereum aims to improve the network’s scalability and security by switching to a proof of stake consensus mechanism.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 9: Jesse Powell Releases the Kraken
entry.summary: Kraken was one of the earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and also made waves for its strong-willed reactions to regulatory changes. CEO Jesse Powell joined the gm podcast to talk to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about Kraken's evolution, the killer use case for NFTs, and how San Francisco's tech scene has changed.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
